sqlMap.sql: SELECT id,bankName,updateUserId,payTypeName,createTime,createUserId,updateTime,gdBankCardNo, bak,hasCheck,image,sign,payType,telephone,mail,contact FROM pay_type WHERE 1=1 <#if id?exists && id != "" > AND id=:id </#if> <#if bankName?exists && bankName != "" > AND bankName=:bankName </#if> <#if updateUserId?exists && updateUserId != "" > AND updateUserId=:updateUserId </#if> <#if payTypeName?exists && payTypeName != "" > AND payTypeName like '%' :payTypeName '%' </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != "" > AND createTime=:createTime </#if> <#if createUserId?exists && createUserId != "" > AND createUserId=:createUserId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != "" > AND updateTime=:updateTime </#if> <#if gdBankCardNo?exists && gdBankCardNo != "" > AND gdBankCardNo=:gdBankCardNo </#if> <#if bak?exists && bak != "" > AND bak=:bak </#if> <#if hasCheck?exists && hasCheck != "" > AND hasCheck=:hasCheck </#if> <#if image?exists && image != "" > AND image=:image </#if> <#if sign?exists && sign != "" > AND sign=:sign </#if> <#if payType?exists && payType != "" > AND payType=:payType </#if> <#if telephone?exists && telephone != "" > AND telephone=:telephone </#if> <#if mail?exists && mail != "" > AND mail=:mail </#if> <#if contact?exists && contact != "" > AND contact=:contact </#if>

SELECT id,bankName,updateUserId,payTypeName,createTime,createUserId,updateTime,gdBankCardNo, bak,hasCheck,image,sign,payType,telephone,mail,contact FROM pay_type WHERE 1=1 <#if id?exists && id != "" > AND id=:id </#if> <#if bankName?exists && bankName != "" > AND bankName=:bankName </#if> <#if updateUserId?exists && updateUserId != "" > AND updateUserId=:updateUserId </#if> <#if payTypeName?exists && payTypeName != "" > AND payTypeName like '%' :payTypeName '%' </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != "" > AND createTime=:createTime </#if> <#if createUserId?exists && createUserId != "" > AND createUserId=:createUserId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != "" > AND updateTime=:updateTime </#if> <#if gdBankCardNo?exists && gdBankCardNo != "" > AND gdBankCardNo=:gdBankCardNo </#if> <#if bak?exists && bak != "" > AND bak=:bak </#if> <#if hasCheck?exists && hasCheck != "" > AND hasCheck=:hasCheck </#if> <#if image?exists && image != "" > AND image=:image </#if> <#if sign?exists && sign != "" > AND sign=:sign </#if> <#if payType?exists && payType != "" > AND payType=:payType </#if> <#if telephone?exists && telephone != "" > AND telephone=:telephone </#if> <#if mail?exists && mail != "" > AND mail=:mail </#if> <#if contact?exists && contact != "" > AND contact=:contact </#if> LIMIT :startRow,:endRow

SELECT count(id) FROM pay_type WHERE 1=1 <#if id?exists && id != "" > AND id=:id </#if> <#if bankName?exists && bankName != "" > AND bankName=:bankName </#if> <#if updateUserId?exists && updateUserId != "" > AND updateUserId=:updateUserId </#if> <#if payTypeName?exists && payTypeName != "" > AND payTypeName like '%' :payTypeName '%' </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != "" > AND createTime=:createTime </#if> <#if createUserId?exists && createUserId != "" > AND createUserId=:createUserId </#if> <#if updateTime?exists && updateTime != "" > AND updateTime=:updateTime </#if> <#if gdBankCardNo?exists && gdBankCardNo != "" > AND gdBankCardNo=:gdBankCardNo </#if> <#if bak?exists && bak != "" > AND bak=:bak </#if> <#if hasCheck?exists && hasCheck != "" > AND hasCheck=:hasCheck </#if> <#if image?exists && image != "" > AND image=:image </#if> <#if sign?exists && sign != "" > AND sign=:sign </#if> <#if payType?exists && payType != "" > AND payType=:payType </#if> <#if telephone?exists && telephone != "" > AND telephone=:telephone </#if> <#if mail?exists && mail != "" > AND mail=:mail </#if> <#if contact?exists && contact != "" > AND contact=:contact </#if>

select id,payType,payTypeName,image,bak,createTime,createUserId,updateTime,updateUserId from pay_type where 1=1
<#if payType?exists && payType!="" > and payType = :payType </#if>
